title: production facilities
extract: Production Facilities. the equipment used for the production of oil or gas located on a production installation, and includes separation, treating and processing facilities, equipment and facilities used in support of production operations, storage areas or tanks and dependent personnel accommodations.Jun 9, 2014
extract_html: Production Facilities. the equipment used for the production of oil or gas located on a production installation, and includes separation, treating and processing facilities, equipment and facilities used in support of production operations, storage areas or tanks and dependent personnel accommodations.Jun 9, 2014
